articles.description: A fungal yeast found in cheese and other foods may wreak havoc in the guts of people with Crohn’s disease, according to new findings. If valid, the findings could lead to new treatments and preventative measures for the chronic and painful condition.
articles.content: A fungal yeast found in cheese and other foods may wreak havoc in the guts of people with Crohns disease, according to new findings. In a study published Thursday, researchers have found evidence tha… [+4583 chars]
